column6: a foreigner by the name of Yip Ngai Meng
column8: asked police send him home after he over stayed on the visa and has no ability to pay the fees.------He came to Cambodia in 01.05.2012
column9: and his visa expired on 28.02.2013. He has been sleeping on the streets for some time.------He was sent to the removal center in Phnom Penh for further action.
